title: create_tax API Request (ZOHOBOOKS)
description: Schema for create_tax - extracted from zohobooks OpenAPI spec

tax_type.description: Type to determine whether it is a simple or compound tax. Allowed Values: tax and compound_tax

tax_factor.description: Type of Tax Factor. Allowed values: rate, share

tax_specific_type.description:
Type of Tax For Indian Edition. Allowed Values : igst ,cgst ,sgst ,nil, cess .
Type of Tax for Mexico Edition. Allowed Values : isr, iva, ieps.
Type of Tax for South Africa Edition. Allowed Values :
soa_less_than_28d - Supply of accommodation not exceeding 28 days,
soa_more_than_28d - Supply of accommodation exceeding than 28 days,
ciu_prev_tax_supply - Change in use (Taxable supplies),
ciu_prev_nontax_supply - Change in use (Non-Taxable supplies),
export_of_shg - Export of second hand goods.

tax_authority_id.description: ID of the tax authority. Tax authority depends on the location of the customer. For example, if the customer is located in NY, then the tax authority is NY tax authority.

country_code.description: Two letter country code for the EU country to which the tax belongs.

purchase_tax_expense_account_id.description: Account ID in which Purchase Tax will be Computed

is_value_added.description: Check if Tax is Value Added

update_recurring_invoice.description: Check if recurring invoice should be updated

update_recurring_expense.description: Check if recurring expenses should be updated

update_draft_invoice.description: Check if Draft Invoices should be updated

update_recurring_bills.description: Check if Recurring Bills should be updated

update_draft_so.description: Check if Draft Sales Orders should be updated

update_subscription.description: Check if Subscriptions should be updated

update_project.description: Check if Projects should be updated
